Posts.Content: Sep 24, 2018 08:53AM Tracy1975 wrote: I was diagnosed in 2016... every time when I go for my annual PET/CT scan, I get very jittery. Most of breast cancer mortality are a result of distant recurrence and from metastatic cancer. When I see mild FDG uptake on my spine in the PET/CT scan report, I feel afraid. Googling did not help me as the statistics of 30% of the cancer patients suffer from distant recurrences... I also don't want to be a Debbie Downer but how do we get through this...
Posts.Title: Statistics Gingermiss65 lulabella
